text:
e="preserve">Eddie Lee Jackson (July 7, 1949 – December 18, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the Illinois House of Representatives from January 9, 2009 through January 11, 2017. He was born in Canalou, Missouri.
Jackson died of COVID-19 on December 18, 2020, in East St. Louis, Illinois. He was 71.
